metadata.synopsis: Try to interact with Shirra Clarwen's tomb lid without having access to the Sentient Amulet that contains the Mad Monk. The Mad Monk wants to be reunited with Shirra, his granddaughter.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe SAM_Crypt"- Unequip the Sentient Amulet- Read the plaque of the back left tomb- Interact with S_WYR_SentientAmulet_Tomb_Lid_97f1280f-f052-4988-b59d-5f972c9651d6

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I should retrieve the amulet - the monk's spirit should be here when I open Shirra's tomb.
